props.name: variant
props.description: Changes the visual representation of the notification panel.

props.name: shadow
props.description: Adds a shadow effect around the notification panel.

props.name: size
props.description: Sets a fixed size for the content container.

props.name: className
props.description: Adds custom classes to the element.

props.name: onClick
props.description: Used in combination with dismissiable property to close the notification panel.

props.name: dismissiable
props.description: Toggles the close button in the top right corner.

props.name: fluid
props.description: Enables a fluid outer container that spans the entire width of parent.

props.name: label
props.description: Sets a label for the notification panel.
